2024-10-09,https://almuftionline.com/2024/10/09/14262/,Shariah Rulling regarding changing the paternity of an adopted child with the permission of the father.,

I adopted a baby girl 10 days old.Her father allowed me to write my husband's name as a father in paper.She is 10 years old now.He(her father) wants to write his name as his father.Please get in touch with me she was 10 days old when I got her.Kindly reply.ยยยย

,"

ุงููุฌูููุงุจู ุจูุงุณููู ููููููู ุงูุตููููุงุจู

Adoption, fostering, and guardianship of another's child is permissible, however, a child who has been adopted does not hold the same legal status as a biological child in terms of Shariah rulings.Matters such as lineage, the right to raise the child, the authority to arrange their marriage, and inheritance rights remain unchanged by adoption. The lineage of a foster child is established through their biological parents. The primary rights of upbringing ,the authority to arrange their marriage and the right to inherit from the child are all matters of Shariah that pertain to the child's biological parents, not the foster parents.These legal matters cannot be altered by human intervention.

Therefore, in the given scenario, even if the child's biological father were to permit you to include your husband's name as the father on the child's legal documents, the child's biological father would remain the legal father. Thus, recording or referring to your husbandโs name as the father is not permissible.ย
